name: OptionGroup
shortDesc: Use the AWS::RDS::OptionGroup resource to create an option group that can make managing data and databases easier. For more information about option groups, see Working with Option Groups in the Amazon Relational Database Service User Guide.

properties.name: EngineName
properties.desc: The name of the database engine that this option group is associated with.

properties.name: MajorEngineVersion
properties.desc: The major version number of the database engine that this option group is associated with.

properties.name: OptionGroupDescription
properties.desc: A description of the option group.

properties.name: OptionConfigurations
properties.desc: The configurations for this option group.

properties.name: Tags
properties.desc: An arbitrary set of tags (keyâ€“value pairs) for this option group.
